text: In total , 76 ( 13 . 8 % ) of 552 SARI patients were positive for HAdV , and the infection rates of HAdV in Northern and Eastern China were 20 . 1 % ( n = 52 ) and 8 . 2 % ( n = 24 ) , respectively . HAdV co - infection with other respiratory viruses was frequent ( infection rates : Northern China , 90 . 4 % ; Eastern China , 70 . 8 % ) . The peak seasons for HAdV - B infection was winter and spring . Additionally , members of multiple species ( Human mastadenovirus B , C , D and PLOS ONE |
